overview: They say blonds always have more fun – and given the evidence displayed here it’s almost certainly true. Indeed, who wants to be a brunet when the biggest, hardest cocks always cum a blond boy’s way! Join Phil Raven, Carl Ross, Connor Levi and Jaxon Radoc as they put their fair-headed skills to the test – proving, without doubt, that if you have a mop of blond then you’re assured of the best action around. All culminating, of course, in the kind of spunk-sodden finale that any blond boy worth his salt spends each and every day dreaming of!
title: Fucking Blonds
